title: FreeZeroCoin
author: FreeZeroCoin
content: I would like to share my new faucet.Paying instantly, no minimum (0.0003 ZER or 0.00000002 LTC).The idea of faucet is like mini game.You have to eat Burger to get calories, then exchange calories into Litecoin or Zero.You can eat as much as you can, no waiting time, no limits.but it's better to eat at steady speed, eating fast will make you fat.When you become very very fat, you will have 1 minute waiting time per claim.if you keep eating while you're fat, you will be risking your life, and this could makes you wait 10 minutes before you re spawn.Please try my faucet and give any suggestions :https://rimakoko.comI hope you will love my simple faucet
